text: Abraham Rubibin Hercules Benrubi (born October 4, 1969) is an American actor. He is known for his roles as Jerry Markovic in the long-running medical television drama ER, as Larry Kubiac on Parker Lewis Can't Lose, Dennis in Without a Paddle and for his voice acting on the Adult Swim claymation series Robot Chicken. He has also been the voices of characters in many video games including many in the World of Warcraft series. ==Other websites== * * at AllMovie Category:1969 births Category:Living people Category:Actors from Indianapolis Category:American voice actors Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:American video game actors
title: Abraham Benrubi
